characterDescription:
Talanor is an Alethi Shardbearer, but possesses only a Shardblade. Adolin means to challenge him to a duel with the intent that his father will maneuver others into agreeing to duels, with the goal being to undermine Sadeas.
As a member of Gavilar's army of twenty-nine years ago, in a battle against Kalanor's army, he won the Blade that he now possesses.
